thread.title: Abbas beats Basem in CAS Championship
thread.title_full: Abbas beats Basem in CAS Championship

title: Abbas beats Basem in CAS Championship
text:
KARACHI: Abbas Shaukat started his campaign on an impressive note by defeating Basem Makram of Egypt in the first qualifying round of the $25,000 Serena Hotels-CAS International Squash Championship in Islamabad on Thursday. 

He defeated Basem 11-9, 6-11, 11-9, 12-10. 

Abbas made his presence felt in the last edition of this event held last October when he as a qualifier reached the quarter-finals by beating many top-ranked national and international players. 

Farhan Mehboob defeated his younger brother Waqas Mehboob 11-5, 11-4, 11-6; Waqar Mehboob beat Salman Zeb 11-7, 9-11, 11-6, 11-7; Asim Khan thrashed Raees Khan 11-3, 11-9, 11-4; Ahsan Ayaz smashed Abbas Maniar of US 11-6, 11-6, 11-6. 

Kashif Asif won against Zahir Shah 11-8, 11-6, 11-5; Shoaib Hassan beat Muhammad Farhan 11-6, 11-8, 11-5; and Saqib Yousaf defeated Haseeb Gul 11-7, 11-7, 11-4. 

In the final qualifying round on Friday (today), Abbas is up against Farhan, Waqar will face Asim, Ahsan takes on Kashif, and Shoaib is drawn against Saqib.
